Before Dermott reviews the financials in greater detail, I'd like to start with a few remarks
about our progress in the quarter.
In short, we delivered another quarter of improved financial performance, with positive operating
leverage on the back of solid fee growth and continued expense discipline.
And we continued to make tangible progress on our path to be more for our clients, to
run our company better and to power our culture.

clients.
Even with this rich history of operating across four centuries, I believe that our best
days remain ahead of us.
That bank with around half a million dollars of capital in 1784, today oversees roughly

We are this year, in January, you heard us layout our strategy, which maps out what

to BNY, to improve the market's familiarity with who we are and what we do.

are doing to unlock our full potential as one BNY.
Now referring to page two of the financial highlights presentation, the NY delivered solid
EPS growth, as well as free tax margin and ROTCE expansion, once again, on the back of
positive operating leverage in the second quarter.

items, earnings per share of $1.51 was up 9%.

This included 5% growth in investment services fees, led by continued strength, influence
in collateral management, asset servicing and treasury services, while as 16% growth
in foreign exchange revenue.
That interest income decreased by 6%.

people and technology while we also continued to realise greater efficiencies.
Arjun was 33%.

equity of 25%, 24%, excluding notable items.
These financial results were against the backdrop of a relatively constructive operating environment.
The market calling for a gradual and shallow easing of policy rates, inflation pressures
easing and investor confidence growing.

lower compared to the first quarter.

quarter.

of decades.

through major shifts like this further strengthening their trust in us and deepening our relationships

ecosystem to support the company's evolving investment activities.

Wove.

as part of its annual innovators awards for 2024.

a suite of new solutions on the platform.
